devdoc.details: This contract implements only supply and withdraw functionlity

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

returns._0: Number of users who can decrypt global data
True if user can decrypt global vault data

onConfidentialTransferReceived(address,a.details: This function is called when cWETH tokens are transferred to this vault

params.from: The address that sent the tokens

returns._0: ebool indicating if the transfer was accepted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supply(bytes32,bytes).details: Flow:      1) User sets this vault as operator on cWETH (setOperator)      2) Frontend encrypts amount for THIS vault and calls supply(encryptedAmount, inputProof)      3) We convert external handle to euint64 and pull via confidentialTransferFromAndCall         which triggers onConfidentialTransferReceived to update encrypted accounting

params.inputProof: Proof for the encrypted amount (FHE input proof)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(bytes32,bytes).details: Users can withdraw their encrypted shares as cWETH tokensCONFIDENTIAL: No plaintext amounts are exposed

params.inputProof: Proof for the encrypted amount (FHE input proof)

devdoc.title: Confidential Lending Vault

getAuthorizedUserCount().notice: Get the total number of authorized users

getEncryptedShares(address).notice: Get encrypted shares of a user

isUserAuthorized(address).notice: Check if a user is authorized to decrypt global data

onConfidentialTransferReceived(address,a.notice: Handle incoming confidential transfers from cWETH

supply(bytes32,bytes).notice: Supply cWETH to the vault by pulling tokens from user (vault is operator)

userdoc.notice: ERC-4626 analogous vault for confidential lending with encrypted balances
